title: Projects
text:
Here’s a showcase of some of my recent projects. Each project demonstrates different skills and techniques in data science and programming.




A clustering model that identifies customer segments based on purchasing behavior, helping businesses target their marketing efforts more effectively.
View Project →




An interactive dashboard built with R Shiny that visualizes sales data and provides insights into regional performance and trends.
View Project →




A text analysis tool that extracts key topics and sentiment from customer reviews, helping businesses understand customer feedback at scale.
View Project →




A forecasting model that predicts future sales based on historical data, accounting for seasonality and external factors.
View Project →

title: Andrea’s Website
text:
Hello! I’m Andrea, a data scientist and programmer passionate about solving complex problems with data.


I work with data science tools and techniques to extract insights and build solutions. My expertise includes machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization.






Latest Projects



Check out my Projects page to see what I’ve been working on lately!








Blog Updates



Read my latest thoughts and tutorials on data science and programming.

title: About Me
text: I am a data scientist and programmer with expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization. I’m passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and creating intuitive visualizations to communicate insights.

title: About Me
text:
Experience
Senior Data Scientist | Company Name | 2022-Present - Led development of predictive models for customer behavior - Implemented machine learning pipelines using Python and R - Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy solutions
Data Analyst | Previous Company | 2018-2022 - Analyzed large datasets to extract business insights - Created interactive dashboards using Tableau and R Shiny - Automated reporting processes using Python

title: About Me
text:
Skills

Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, JavaScript
Data Science: Machine Learning, Statistical Analysis, Data Visualization
Tools: Jupyter, RStudio, Git, Docker
Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, tidyverse

title: About Me
text:
Interests
When I’m not working with data, I enjoy hiking, photography, and playing chess. I’m also an avid reader and enjoy participating in community tech meetups.
